about_the_game:
Official game soundtrack for Detective Di: The Silk Rose Murders. Relive the game's engrossing Chinese setting and rich atmosphere across 14 original tracks by Andrea Giachini.

Please Note: Once purchased, the bonus content will appear in the game's root installation directory.

Track list:

01. Main Theme (1:34)
02. Moonlight, Blood Night (2:22)
03. The Investigation Begins (1:57)
04. The Reenactments (1:26)
05. No Turning Back (2:53)
06. The Dream Pagoda (1:48)
07. The Detective Rises (1:36)
08. The Justice Department (2:56)
09. The Empress of China (2:48)
10. Scene of the Crime (2:14)
11. The Paradise Cloud (1:50)
12. Silence is Golden (1:46)
13. Inner Demons (1:42)
14. Secrets and Tombs (2:14)
